name: chorus
description: A harmony-based music composition toolkit with MIDI I/O
author: Adam Murray <adam@compusition.com>

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.cover: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --root src --include-all-sources node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- test/*.js test/**/*.js
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run coveralls
scripts.docs: node_modules/.bin/jsdoc src --configure etc/jsdoc.json --recurse --destination docs --readme etc/docs-home.md && cat etc/jsdoc-additional-styles.css >> docs/styles/jsdoc-default.css
scripts.docs-watch: nodemon -w etc -w src -e js,css,md -x npm run docs
